item.description:
Our next dance is at Anthony's and Spring in the air, it's time to get out and blossom.
We'll be dancing, mingling, and listening to great music all night long.

FREE SPEED DATING SESSION STARTS AT 8PM, so get there early.
$7 early bird cover till 8:15 then $10 after that.

Lots of new and familiar faces every dance. This is a great night out either alone or with friends.
Now that the nice weather is here, we'll probably top 200 people.

Large Dance floor / Beautiful Ballroom / Free Hor's Doeuvres / Coffee / Plenty of free parking / DJ Playing request

item.name: MAY I have this dance?
